entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate syntax node callbacks for PrimaryConstructorBaseType #70488
  • Roslyn crashes when accessing exception variable #70483
    17.9
  • Improve the user experience for Add reference quick action with respect to Incompatible references #70479
    Backlog

Closed

  • Crash when applying code fix to aspx file that is open in Visual Studio #67410
    17.9
  • Setting .editorconfig trim_trailing_whitespace option to false is ignored #41666
    Backlog
  • `Nullable<T> ?? constant-expr` generates unnecessary temporary #56007
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34220.23 #70486
  • Make restore.cmd and build.cmd runnable from Git Bash #31466

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary casts. #70504
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report all errors and rude edits to the log #70503
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Prevent a bit of dictionary resizing in NullableWalker.Variables.Populate #70502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Test update editor version to 17.8.216 #70500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Skip elements with false conditions during evaluation #70496
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'use collection expression' with await-foreach calls #70494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • PR feedback and further cleanup/sharing in extract method code. #70481
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce dependency on ImmutableDictionary in CompletionItem's properties storage. #70474
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70498
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add IVT to a future unified razor test project #70485
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Shorten the namedpipe used to connect with C# extension #70492
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Mark diagnostics as being 'live' or not in LSP #70402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer extract method mutation computation till the point the code action is invoked. #70477
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Front load extract-method syntax and semantic checks. #70466
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Tiny cleanup in SyntaxGenerator. #70480
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix issue where primary constructors were not being grouped across TFMs in the results window #70476
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update ExternalAccess for EditorConfig #70415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70478
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70473
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bugs/22745 Naming style does not match for camel case and pascal case with underscores #56157
    Area-IDE
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync project cone) #70333
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Utilize ConstantValueOne while emitting conditionals #70352
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test CI with version only change #70471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
